locale.label: Locale - Leave blank if you want Magento to define this value.

google_base_offer_id.label:
Item Google Shopping Id -
Provide this field only if you submit feeds for Google Shopping.
Product ID can be found in the data feed you submit to Google Shopping through Google Merchant Center. Alternatively you can see it by clicking on a specific product in the Products tab in your Merchant center account.
If your product pages have multiple items per page, set the variable ITEM_GOOGLE_SHOPPING_ID to include the ID of the most prominent product on the current page. This integration will allow Google to more easily correlate specific products to data provided by you in connection with Google Trusted Stores.
You may delete this entire line for category pages with no prominent product(s).

google_base_subaccount_id.label:
Item Google Shopping Account Id -
Provide this field only if you submit feeds for Google Shopping.
Account ID from Google Merchant Center. This value should match the account ID you use to submit your product data feed to Google Shopping through Google Merchant center. If you have a MCA account, use the subaccount ID associated with that product feed.

google_base_country.label:
Item Google Shopping Country -
Provide this field only if you submit feeds for Google Shopping.
Account country from Google Shopping. This value should match the account country you use to submit your product data feed to Google Shopping.
The value of the country parameter should be a two-letter ISO 3166 country code.
For example, values could be “US”, “GB”, “AU”, “FR”, “DE”, “JP”.

google_base_language.label:
Provide this field only if you submit feeds for Google Shopping.
Account language from Google Shopping. This value should match the account language you use to submit your product data feed to Google Shopping.
The value of the language parameter should be a two-letter ISO 639-1 language code.
For example, values could be "en", "fr", "de", "ja".
